name: e-payeye payments
author: PayEye

sections.description: Express e-payeye payments for WooCommerce. Increase sales by shortening the shopping process and reducing shopping cart abandonment.
sections.installation:
• Submit a form to create merchant account: https://payeye.com/business-e-commerce#ecommerce-form
  • After you received your configuration keys, follow configuration instructions from: https://static.payeye.com/e-commerce/modules/woocommerce/e-payeye/Instalation_and_update_WooCommerce_0.8.4_EN.pdf
sections.changelog:
1.0.3 – 2024-06-21

  • Fix error when uploading config while when installed other plugins like Safe-svg

1.0.2 – 2024-05-17

  • Fix for exception for missing config files.

1.0.1 – 2024-05-09

  • Fix for stuck first plugin setup by config

1.0.0 – 2024-02-05

  • Added new PayEye lib with support for API v2
  • Added new On Click feature with settings
  • Added Invoices support
  • New initial configurator with JSON file
  • New Shipping method DPD
  • Fix for payments with changing from cart types with shipping to virtual
  • Fix for carts with additional fees
  • Fix for stuck widget after failed payment

0.9.1 – 2024-01-24

  • Fix for default widget visibility

0.9.0 – 2024-01-23

  • Widget positioning options
  • Manual shipping options
  • Added support for InPost plugin (inpost-for-woocommerce)
  • Fix for undefined options notices

0.8.4 – 2023-12-14

  • Hide payeye coupons

0.8.3 – 2023-12-07

  • Fix hide widget when cart is empty

0.8.2 – 2023-11-21

  • Fix prices on widget
  • Fix prices with tax
  • Add shop country validation in back office
  • Add on-click widget solution

0.8.0 – 2023-08-25

  • Nullable shippingId

0.6.2 – 2023-07-24

  • Added support for WP Desk DHL (dhl_parcelshop)

0.6.1 – 2023-07-24

  • Added support image URL (RFC)

0.6.0 – 2023-06-12

  • Added support return

0.5.2 – 2023-06-07

  • Added support base Image URL if product with attributes have not image

0.4.0 – 2023-05-25

  • Added support for Furgonetka.pl

0.3.0 – 2023-05-17

  • Added bottom position to widget settings

0.2.0 – 2023-04-28

  • Added redirect to checkout page after success payment
  • Added clear cart event

0.1.0 – 2023-04-24

  • First release!

description: Express e-payeye payments for WooCommerce. Increase sales by shortening the shopping process and reducing shopping cart abandonment.
